title: Sabai Community
author: Sabai Community
created_time: July 11, 2022, 01:35:05 PMLast edit: July 11, 2022, 01:46:43 PM by Sabai Community
content: Airdrop and Giveaway   Free Galaxy NFT$2000 in Sabai Token[ Unique NFT with huge in-game bonusesGENERAL RULES⚠️Date: Now — 1 August  Rewards: Stage 1 - NFT for everyone who complete the tasks Stage 2 - 150 000 SABAI TokensStage 3 - Sabai Landowner NFT, Sabai Tokens, Sabai LAND for the lucky winners ✔️ We are allocating 150 000 SABAI tokens ✔️ Sabai Tokens will be awarded randomly ✔️ Token distribution will take place after the launch of the game and vesting✔️ The token distribution process to participants will be arranged and carried out by the Sabai Ecoverse Team✔️ You will need an ETH address for claiming SABAI tokens ✔️ All participants must join Sabai Telegram chat✔️ All participants must join Discord Channel✔️ Using multiple accounts, cheating, and spamming are not allowed✔️ We reserve the right to make changes on any terms if it’s reasonable to do so✔️ We reserve the right to make adjustments and modifications to the rules if necessary✔️ By agreeing to this rule, you are subject to the existing rulesStage 1 - GALAXY CAMPAIGN⚠️Date: Now — 25 July Rewards: Sabai Land Explorer NFT What-To-Do: ✔️ Join Sabai Telegram chat✔️ Join Discord Channel✔️ Go to Sabai Ecoverse World map✔️ Find any land with “choose” button (not all the lands have it)✔️ Choose the land that you like the most and fill out a short form✔️ Claim your NFT on Project GalaxyStage 2 - AIRDROP CAMPAIGN⚠️Date: Now — 1 August Rewards: 150 000 SABAI tokens ($ 2000)  What-To-Do: ✔️ Complete Stage 1✔️ Post Proof of Authentication here ✔️ We will randomly choose 100 winners and give away 1500 SABAI Tokens for every winner Proof of Authentication Post FormatCode:Bitcointalk Username:Bitcointalk Profile Link:Discord Handle:Polygon Wallet Address:Stage 3 - NFT CAMPAIGN⚠️Date: Now — 1 August Rewards: Sabai Landowner NFT, SABAI Tokens, Sabai LAND  What-To-Do: ✔️ Complete Stage 1 ✔️ After activity will finished, we will choose 6 different plots of lands. Three of them will be the ones that were picked by the most. The rest three lands will be selected by a random number generator.✔️ We will gift Tokens and Sabai Landowner NFT to the participants who chosen this lands. The winners will be chosen randomly.✔️ The winner’s names will be announced on our Sabai Telegram channelABOUT SABAI ECOVERSESabai Ecoverse is a new generation platform that connects blockchain and real estate business. It will include browser light game, marketplace and multiplayer sim tycoon game with its own ecoverse, which allows users to buy, rent, build, upgrade and monetize the resort infrastructure and its staff in strategic, deep and diverse solo and social cycles of activity based on blockchain tokenomics, tourist flow management tools and game resources. Build your own tropical paradise inside the ecoverse and attract more guests. Sabai Ecoverse has the connection to real world items - you will be able to rent and purchase real assets with Sabai Tokens.Check our WebsiteRead more in our Whitepaper Join our Social Networks
